titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for an adjournment of the House from July 1 to July 7, 1987, and a recess of the Senate from July 1 or 2, 1987 to July 7, 1987.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 7/1/1987--Introduced. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from July 1 to July 7, 1987, and a recess of the Senate from July 1 or 2 to July 7, 1987.
